posts.text: 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526/** * @author: 61åˆ† * @date: 2022/4/13 0:23 * @description: */public class popSort { public static void main(String[] args) { int[] nums={1,2,3,4,5,6,89,77}; int tmp = 0; for (int i = 0; i < nums.length-1; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < nums.length-i-1; j++) { if (nums[j]<nums[j+1]){ tmp = nums[j]; nums[j] = nums[j+1]; nums[j+1] = tmp; } } } for (int k = 0; k < nums.length; k++) { System.out.println(nums[k]); } }}
